title: Around the clock
creator_credit: David Morgan, John Richardson, Kestrel Films & Video (Australia) and Department of Postmaster-General
brief_description: There are approximately 5,500 official and unofficial post offices under the auspices of Australia Post. The film shows various aspects of the work done by Australia Post, moving mail by land, air, and sea. No credits available.
creator_credit_for_label: David Morgan, John Richardson, Kestrel Films & Video (Australia) and Department of Postmaster-General
